column4: How should I manage services in ubuntu 10, seems there is no longer an official app for that?
i sent you the message, it's not as good as the old services GUI but it's an alternative-of-sorts.  The "real" way is just to use command line management at the moment.
is that the sysv-rc-conf thing? I'm fine with cmd-line...

that's for init stuff yes - which Upstart should be backwards compatible with i believe.  but i've had to rename scripts in init (not init.d) to disable stuff?  hopefully you'll learn better method ;)
